'''1.6.4'''<ref>https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/62046814967/minecraft-164</ref> is a minor update to {{JE}} released on September 19, 2013, which fixed a bug where structures would not save with the world file.<ref>{{tweet|dinner|380722487186972672|1.6.4 has been released through the launcher. Server links in their usual place at http://minecraft.net/download|September 19, 2013}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''<samp>[[server.properties]]</samp>'''
* Added <samp>server.properties</samp> option {{cd|player-idle-timeout}}.
** Kicks players from a server when they are idle for a set amount of minutes
** Defaults to disabled (0).
